QtoSetDef.Name: Qto_SpaceHeaterBaseQuantities
QtoSetDef.Definition: Base quantities that are common to the definition of all types of space heaters.

QtoDef.Name: GrossWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Weight of the element itself, not including contained fluid.

QtoDef.Name: Length
QtoDef.Definition: Length of the water tube inside the component, if applicable.

QtoDef.Name: NetWeight
QtoDef.Definition: Weight of the element, including contained fluid as designed.
